_This class is supported by DataCamp, an intuitive learning platform for data science. Learn R, Python, and SQL the way many people learn best, through a combination of short expert videos and hands-on-the-keyboard exercises. Take over 100+ courses by expert instructors on topics such as importing data, data visualization, or machine learning and learn faster through immediate and personalised feedback on every exercise._
